thread.title: Oracle Fixes 154 Security Flaws Affecting Tens of Products, Including Java & MySQL
thread.title_full: Oracle Fixes 154 Security Flaws Affecting Tens of Products, Including Java & MySQL - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Oracle Fixes 154 Security Flaws Affecting Tens of Products, Including Java & MySQL
text: Oracle has a weird way of dealing with security fixes. Instead of issuing a patch whenever a security flaw is detected in one of its products, the company generally waits and releases patches once every three months. These security release sessions are called Critical Patch Updates (CPU), and for the month of October, Oracle's recent CPU included no more t... Â»
